data.message: Hi Facebook! I can't search "karachi jobs" on facebook latest search bar. It is not showing any result there from 4 weeks :( I'm looking for job through facebook . still not showing any result there when i search 'karachi jobs' on facebook latest search bar. Please fix this problem as soon as possible. Thank you :(

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out to us, Abdul. Can you please give us more detail here http://bit.ly/2efVkEo? -Joe
Facebook  i already given more detail with screenshot there, but there is no response to my report problem, still having that probem when i search 'karachi jobs' on facebook latest search bar :(
Facebook  Joe check the inbox on this page, i send you screenshot also in inbox .
Hi facebook! I can't live stream on my facebook. But i try to use other user live on my phone it's can !! Please help me. Now i use iphone7!!
